ID: CL25NVC_00
From: Salwa Al Mamari <Salwa.Almamari@chalhoub.com>
To: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>
CC: L'Occitane En Provence Manar Mall <Loccitane.ManarMall@Loccitane.me>; Myrla Pascual <Myrla.Pascual@loccitane.me>; Omar Alshashaa <Omar.Alshashaa@loccitane.me>
BCC: 
Date: 2025-04-13 16:29
Subject: FW: Retail Shops Licenses & Certificates - LOCCITANE
--------------------------------------------------
Dear Hagop,

 

Hope you're doing well.

 

We’ve received a request from the mall management to submit the updated shop insurance certificate for L’Occitane – Manar Mall/RAK, as the current one in their required has expired.

 

Kindly share the valid insurance documents at your earliest convenience so we can comply with the mall’s requirements.

 

Thank you for your support.

 

Best regards,

 

 

SALWA AL MAMARI​​​​

ASSOCIATE ‑ ADMINISTRATION

REAL EMIRATES LLC

DUBAI

‑

UNITED ARAB EMIRATES

+971 4 387 2000

+97145632034

 	
 <https://chalhoubgroup.com/> 

CHALHOUBGROUP.COM <http://www.chalhoubgroup.com/> 


‑
